related_questions.question: What are the 3 types of solar energy?
related_questions.snippet: The Three Types of Solar Cells. There are three basic types of solar cell. Monocrystalline cells are cut from a silicon ingot grown from a single large crystal of silicon whilst polycrystalline cells are cut from an ingot made up of many smaller crystals. The third type is the amorphous or thin-film solar cell.

answer_box.title: Solar Energy | A Student's Guide to Global Climate Change ...
answer_box.snippet: Solar energy is simply the light and heat that come from the sun. People can harness the sun's energy in a few different ways: Photovoltaic cells, which convert sunlight into electricity. Solar thermal technology, where heat from the sun is used to make hot water or steam.

organic_results.title: Solar power - Energy Education
organic_results.snippet: There are two main methods: photovoltaic cells and solar thermal collectors. While solar thermal collectors are typically less complex, photovoltaic cells can be more useful as they directly transform solar radiation into electricity. See the interactive graph below for more statistics on solar power in the world.

organic_results.snippet: On the directly used systems, the solar energy can be captured to generate electricity or heat through a system of panels or mirrors.
